summary: This bill, H.R. 1276, aims to remove deed restrictions from a specific parcel of land in Paducah, Kentucky. The Secretary of the Interior is tasked with executing the necessary instruments to eliminate all restrictions, including easements and covenants, detailed in a 2012 quitclaim deed. The affected land comprises approximately 3.62 acres located at 2956 Park Avenue, within the Paducah Memorial Army Reserve Center, previously conveyed by the Secretary of the Interior to the City of Paducah, Kentucky.
